Turn the cereal box into a mini greenhouse: Cut the top of the cereal box and poke a few holes in the sides. Fill it with soil and add small plants to create a mini greenhouse that can be used to grow herbs or small flowers.
Create a of with: Cut the cereal box into a fun shape and decorate it with paint or stickers. Place a inside and use it as a to.
Use the cereal box as a pad: Cut the cereal box into individual squares and use them as a pad to take notes or draw.
Create a of pad: Cut the cereal box into a pad shape and use it to write or draw.
